item.title: Homelab
item.author: Vinícius Moraes

This project is a custom home server that involves a wide range of areas, including virtualization, containerization, network security, system administration, and infrastructure as code. item.title: AWS Cloud
item.author: Vinícius Moraes
item.description: Area: cloud Date: 2018-2022 This project involved deploying dynamic websites on AWS, managing network, DNS, snapshots, and system updates on Ubuntu Server instances. To accomplish this, I employed a combination of AWS resources, such as Route 53 and Lightsail, along with remote and security tools. During its operation, I also handled other tasks including WordPress management, content creation, and website design and customization. Ubuntu Server Route 53 Lightsail CloudWatch Bitnami Wordpress Multisite
item.content:encoded:
Area: cloud
Date: 2018-2022

This project involved deploying dynamic websites on AWS, managing network, DNS, snapshots, and system updates on Ubuntu Server instances. To accomplish this, I employed a combination of AWS resources, such as Route 53 and Lightsail, along with remote and security tools. During its operation, I also handled other tasks including WordPress management, content creation, and website design and customization.

  • Ubuntu Server
  • Route 53
  • Lightsail
  • CloudWatch
  • Bitnami
  • Wordpress Multisite
